surname Dui
to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱
to break away from/to cast off (old ideas etc)/to get rid of/to break away (from)/to break out (of)/to free oneself from/to extricate oneself
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
to reveal one's talent (idiom)/to rise above others/to distinguish oneself
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
to run away/to escape
to untie/to free/to absolve of/to get free of/to extirpate oneself/(Buddhism) to free oneself of worldly worries
to take off (clothing)
to come apart
to throw off/to struggle free of/Taiwan pr. [zheng1 tuo1]
to remove/to take off/to strip off/to discard/to shed/to come off/to fall off
free and at ease/natural/unconstrained
to get away/to escape (from obligations)/to free oneself/to disengage
to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive

sentences.english: Extraction of oil from the wheat germ leaves behind the defatted wheat germ.
sentences.chinese: 脱脂肪麦胚是小麦胚提油后的产品。

sentences.english: Then old Peter took his big coat off and lifted down the samovar from the shelf.
sentences.chinese: 老彼得脱下大衣，从架子上拿起茶炊。

sentences.english: Snakes cast off and renew their skins.
sentences.chinese: 蛇脱了皮，又再长出皮来。

sentences.english: The ability of clay minerals to catalyse decarboxylation has long been recognised.
sentences.chinese: 粘土矿物能催化脱羧基作用是早已认识到的问题。

sentences.english: The average foot perspires a pint of moisture per day.
sentences.chinese: 平均脚出汗一品脱每天的水分。

sentences.english: He is still in his overcoat even when he's in the room.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕是在房间里，他也是穿着大衣不脱。

sentences.english: Drop your pants, maybe I'll remember.
sentences.chinese: 把裤子脱了，可能老娘有印象。

sentences.english: At the same time, it is described how to treat the denitrified residua.
sentences.chinese: 同时还简要介绍了脱氮残渣的处理方法。

sentences.english: The little old lady pulls off her knickers and lifts up her dress.
sentences.chinese: 只见小老太太脱下短裤，撩起上衣。

sentences.english: The neon which symbolizes material (or "materialism") has all of a sudden been deprived of its target.
sentences.chinese: 象征物欲的霓虹突然被扯脱了其所施欲的对象。

sentences.english: I was a child and she was a child.
sentences.chinese: 那会儿我还是个孩子，她也未脱稚气。

sentences.english: She was asked to disrobe and wait for the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 要她脱去衣服等候医生检查。

sentences.english: Colonel Forster gives us reason to expect him here soon.
sentences.chinese: 弗斯脱上校说，他一定立刻就到我们这里来。

sentences.english: I don't like wearing the uniform.
He said that he has not yet to take off pants, the goods have been into the to clean the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 他说那天他还未脱去裤子，阿财已入来清洁澡堂。

sentences.english: Shuck your dirty shirt and put on a new one.
sentences.chinese: 把你的脏衬衣脱了，换一件干净的。
